Omar's Tools - YouTube Downloader & Converter
=============================================

HOW TO USE:
1. Double-click OmarsTools.exe
2. Browser will open automatically
3. Keep the black window open while using
4. Press Ctrl+C to stop

FEATURES:
- YouTube Music Downloader (MP3)
- YouTube Video Downloader (MP4 with quality selection)
- XML/JSON Converter

REQUIREMENTS:
- Windows 10/11
- FFmpeg (for video/audio processing)

INSTALL FFMPEG:
- Download from: https://ffmpeg.org/download.html
- Watch: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JR36oH35Fgg&t4s&pp=ygUlaG93IHRvIGRvd25sb2FkIGZmbXBlZyBmb3Igd2luZG93cyAxMQ%3D%3D
- OR use Chocolatey: choco install ffmpeg

TROUBLESHOOTING:
- If antivirus blocks it, allow it (it's safe!)
- If downloads fail, install FFmpeg
- Keep the console window open

Made with ❤️ by Omar
